column4: Hello :) i have Intel DG31PR motherboard with Intel E2200 Dual Core CPU and integrated Graphics Card GMA 3100 and Realtek ALC888 audio (integrated) will i be able to run ubuntu with this system, i want to be able to use 3D modeling apps and have my Surround sound working :)
btw should i use 64bit or 32bit ubuntu ? o-o
do you have a 64 bit computer?
yes i'm running Windows server 2003 x64 now
